Module.Name: inventory
Module.Description: This file contains structural information for the inventory module

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique inventory database id field, can be omitted to insert with next available table id

Field.Name: sku
Field.Description: Unique inventory SKU ID, max 24 characters

Field.Name: inactive
Field.Description: Whether the inventory item is inactive (0 - Active, 1 - Inactive)

Field.Name: inventory_type
Field.Description: Inventory type, 2 characters (See help file for current allowed types)

Field.Name: description_short
Field.Description: Short description (32 characters) of inventory item used for listings and inventory operations

Field.Name: description_purchase
Field.Description: Description for Purchase, shows up on orders to vendors

Field.Name: description_sales
Field.Description: Description for Sales, shows up on Invoices, Sales Orders and Quotes.

Field.Name: image_with_path
Field.Description: Path and image filename for inventory item (from the my_files/company/inventory directory)

Field.Name: account_sales_income
Field.Description: General Ledger account to use for Sales transactions

Field.Name: account_inventory_wage
Field.Description: General Ledger account to use for Purchase transactions

Field.Name: account_cost_of_sales
Field.Description: General Ledger account to use for cost of goods sold calculations

Field.Name: item_taxable
Field.Description: Links to the record ID field in the sales_tax table to set the default tax rate for sales of the inventory item

Field.Name: purch_taxable
Field.Description: Links to the record ID field in the sales_tax table to set the default tax rate for purchases of the inventory item

Field.Name: item_cost
Field.Description: Specifies the default item cost used when generating purchase orders and purchases.

Field.Name: cost_method
Field.Description: Specifies the costing type to use when inventory items are sold

Field.Name: price_sheet
Field.Description: Specifies the default price sheet to use when adding inventory items to a Sale.

Field.Name: full_price
Field.Description: Specifies the full price of the item

Field.Name: item_weight
Field.Description: Specifies the weight of the item.

Field.Name: quantity_on_hand
Field.Description: Specifies quantity in stock of items that are tracked in the general ledger

Field.Name: quantity_on_order
Field.Description: Specifies quantity on order of items that are tracked in the general ledger

Field.Name: quantity_on_sales_order
Field.Description: Specifies quantity on sales order of items that are tracked in the general ledger

Field.Name: quantity_on_allocation
Field.Description: Specifies quantity on allocation of items that are tracked in the general ledger

Field.Name: minimum_stock_level
Field.Description: Specifies the minimum stock level to determine re-order notices

Field.Name: reorder_quantity
Field.Description: Specifies re-order quantity when restocking is required

Field.Name: vendor_id
Field.Description: Specifies contact table record ID of the preferred vendor for the inventory item

Field.Name: lead_time
Field.Description: Specifies re-order quantity when restocking is required

Field.Name: upc_code
Field.Description: Specifies the 13 digit UPC bar code assigned code the inventory item

Field.Name: serialize
Field.Description: Specifies whether the inventory item is a serialized type of item.

Field.Name: creation_date
Field.Description: Specifies the date the item was first entered into the system

Field.Name: last_update
Field.Description: Specifies the last date the inventory item has been updated.

Field.Name: last_journal_date
Field.Description: Specifies the last date the inventory item has been used in a transaction.

Table.Name: inventory_assy_list
Table.Description: Contains the assembly list for inventory items of type 'as'

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: ref_id
Field.Description: Reference ID, links to record ID in table inventory. Required if importing assembly items without the inventory record

Field.Name: sku
Field.Description: Inventory SKU as part of the referenced assembly, must exist in table inventory, field sku

Field.Name: description
Field.Description: Description of the inventory, typically matches the short name of the SKU field in table inventory

Field.Name: qty
Field.Description: Quantity of the item required to make the assembly

Table.Name: inventory_categories
Table.Description: Contains custom inventory tabs that appear on the Inventory -> Maintian page

Field.Name: category_id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: category_name
Field.Description: title of the inventory maintenance tab

Field.Name: sort_order
Field.Description: Sort (sequence) order of the tab

Field.Name: category_description
Field.Description: Description of the custom inventory maintenance tab

Table.Name: inventory_cogs_owed
Table.Description: Inventory list of items that have been sold but not in stock

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: journal_main_id
Field.Description: Reference ID to the table journal_main that added the record

Field.Name: store_id
Field.Description: Reference ID to the contacts table for the store that added the record

Field.Name: sku
Field.Description: SKU that was sold to make inventory go negative

Field.Name: qty
Field.Description: Quantity owed to re-post when inventory becomes available

Field.Name: post_date
Field.Description: Contains the date of the transaction that caused the sKU to go negative

Table.Name: inventory_cogs_usage
Table.Description: Contains the history of inventory sold

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: journal_main_id
Field.Description: Reference ID to the table journal_main that added the record

Field.Name: qty
Field.Description: Quantity sold for a given transaction

Field.Name: inventory_history_id
Field.Description: Contains a reference to the inventory_history table where the transaction occured

Table.Name: inventory_fields
Table.Description: Contains the custom field information for fields added to the inventory table

Field.Name: inv_field_id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: entry_type
Field.Description: Contains the type of field added, used to generated the proper form field type in the inventory maintain screen

Field.Name: field_name
Field.Description: Database field name added to table inventory

Field.Name: description
Field.Description: Description of the Field used on the form

Field.Name: category_id
Field.Description: Reference to table inventory_categories where this field is place on maintenance form

Field.Name: params
Field.Description: serialized array field to hold details of field for form generation

Table.Name: inventory_history
Table.Description: Contains the history of inventory items bought/sold for cogs calculations

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: ref_id
Field.Description: Reference to journal_main record ID where the transaction took place

Field.Name: store_id
Field.Description: Branch/store ID record in table contacts where the transaction took place

Field.Name: journal_id
Field.Description: The journal ID number of the general ledger journal affected

Field.Name: sku
Field.Description: Inventory SKU for the transaction

Field.Name: qty
Field.Description: Quantity of SKU for the transaction

Field.Name: serialize_number
Field.Description: Contains the serial number for serialized type numbers

Field.Name: remaining
Field.Description: Contains a running total of remaining items at the associated cost

Field.Name: unit_cost
Field.Description: Unit cost of the item added to the record

Field.Name: post_date
Field.Description: Post date of the transaction that added the record to the table

Table.Name: inventory_ms_list
Table.Description: Contains references to posibilities of Master Stock types of inventory items

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: sku
Field.Description: Inventory table SKU field

Field.Name: attr_name_0
Field.Description: Master Stock Attribute Short Reference 1, used to append to SKU

Field.Name: attr_name_1
Field.Description: Master Stock Attribute Short Reference 2, used to append to SKU

Field.Name: attr_0
Field.Description: Master Stock attribute full description 1

Field.Name: attr_1
Field.Description: Master Stock attribute full description 2

Table.Name: inventory_purchase
Table.Description: Contains purchase and vendor information for purchasing inventory

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: sku
Field.Description: SKU to link to inventory table

Field.Name: vendor_id
Field.Description: Unique database id field for the vendor located in the contacts table

Field.Name: description_purchase
Field.Description: Description for purchase from the vendor, may contain vendor part numbers, unique descriptions, etc.

Field.Name: purch_package_quantity
Field.Description: Number of units per package purchase

Field.Name: purch_taxable
Field.Description: Contains the record id field from the tax_auths table to determine tax rate applied.

Field.Name: item_cost
Field.Description: Item cost of each unit

Field.Name: price_sheet_v
Field.Description: Name of the price sheet to use as default when purchaing items. Must match name from table price_sheets

Table.Name: inventory_special_prices
Table.Description: Contains special price references to inventory items that do not use price sheet defaults

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: inventory_id
Field.Description: Links to the inventory table record ID

Field.Name: price_sheet_id
Field.Description: Points to the record ID in table price_sheets for reference

Field.Name: price_levels
Field.Description: Encoded string containing the price levels to use for this item

Table.Name: price_sheets
Table.Description: Contains default price sheets to use for all inventory items

Field.Name: id
Field.Description: Unique database id field

Field.Name: sheet_name
Field.Description: Textual name of the price sheet, appears in pull down menus

Field.Name: inactive
Field.Description: Specifies if the price sheet is active (0 - Active, 1 - Inactive)

Field.Name: revision
Field.Description: specifies the revision level of the price sheet

Field.Name: effective_date
Field.Description: Specifies the date that the price sheet takes effect

Field.Name: expiration_date
Field.Description: Specifies the date that the price sheet becomes invalid

Field.Name: default_sheet
Field.Description: Indicates if this sheet is to be used as the default (0 - Not Default, 1 - Default)

Field.Name: default_levels
Field.Description: Encoded string containing the price levels to use for this price sheet
